title: Safeguard Access, Empower Europe: Launching KR21’s Action Plan to Let Libraries be Libraries
content:
The mission of libraries is under threat. Not just from budget cuts or censorship, but from a “silent” crisis: a legal and market framework that is systematically stripping libraries of their right to function. Libraries are being written out of the digital age. It’s time to write them back in.

Today, Knowledge Rights 21 (KR21) launches a definitive roadmap to fight back: Safeguard Access, Empower Europe – An Action Plan to Let Libraries be Libraries.
creator: Stephen Wyber
sourceDescription: We advocate for your right to access and share knowledge!
